subject: HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
The Simsonn software isn't picking up my new shifter.  It seems to be
functioning correctly as I have the lighting at the bottom working and
iRacing is picking up the sequential but I don't see it on my devices at
all in the simsonn software.  Using 2.1.2

conversations.body_text: Hi Chris Dunham,  We will release a new software version today, which will officially add support for the HS Pro calibration page. Please update the software and try it out.Â
